verbs.description: President Trump [V: has] nominated Ronald Mortensen to fill the State Department 's vacant refugee post . Will he continue to decrease admissions from all but a few European countries ?

[ARG0: President Trump] has [V: nominated] [ARG1: Ronald Mortensen] [ARG2: to fill the State Department 's vacant refugee post] . Will he continue to decrease admissions from all but a few European countries ?

President Trump has nominated [ARG2: Ronald Mortensen] to [V: fill] [ARG1: the State Department 's vacant refugee post] . Will he continue to decrease admissions from all but a few European countries ?
President Trump has nominated Ronald Mortensen to fill the State Department 's vacant refugee post . [V: Will] he continue to decrease admissions from all but a few European countries ?

President Trump has nominated Ronald Mortensen to fill the State Department 's vacant refugee post . [ARGM-MOD: Will] [ARG0: he] [V: continue] [ARG1: to decrease admissions from all but a few European countries] ?

President Trump has nominated Ronald Mortensen to fill the State Department 's vacant refugee post . Will [ARG0: he] continue to [V: decrease] [ARG1: admissions from all but a few European countries] ?
